meanings.definition: Tell someone about something; give an account of an event or experience.
meanings.sent1: She recounted her adventure to her friends.
meanings.sent2: He recounted the story of his childhood.
meanings.sent3: The cat recounted its day of napping and chasing mice.
meanings.sent4: The old tree recounted the tales of the forest to the young saplings.
meanings.sent5: The historian recounted the ancient battles with great detail.

meanings.sent1: He recounted the coins in the jar to make sure.
meanings.sent2: She recounted the steps to double-check her work.
meanings.sent3: The robot recounted the numbers on the screen for the third time.
meanings.sent4: The teacher recounted the students in the class before leaving.
meanings.sent5: The scientist recounted the data to confirm the results.
